import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {GlobalState} from '../../../../GlobalState' function BtnRender({product}) { const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [isAdmin] = state.userAPI.isAdmin const addCart = state.u return (
{ isAdmin ? <> Delete Edit : <> Buy View }
) } export default BtnRender
